fullText: Ms. Stiles and Mr. Daniels are both superb, and their performances alone make 'Blackbird' worth seeing, even though you may well leave the theater feeling as though you need a long, hot shower.
dtliExcerpt: Ms. Stiles and Mr. Daniels are both superb, and their performances alone make 'Blackbird' worth seeing, even though you may well leave the theater feeling as though you need a long, hot shower.
bwwExcerpt: David Harrower's "Blackbird," a pruriently manipulative tale of pedophilia that made a lot of noise off Broadway in 2007, has finally made it to Broadway in a big-stage revival closely similar to the small-scaled production that I reviewed in this space nine years ago...It's a have-it-both-ways shocker that seeks to make us sympathize (but not really!) with a man (Mr. Daniels) who molested a 12-year-old girl (Ms. Williams)...
showScoreExcerpt: Ms. Stiles and Mr. Daniels are both superb, and their performances alone make 'Blackbird' worth seeing, even though you may well leave the theater feeling as though you need a long, hot shower.
